title: Apple’s latest Shot on iPhone 13 Pro short film spotlights food culture in Singapore [Video]
content:
On Apple’s YouTube channel, the company is promoting a mini-documentary called Poached. Shot on iPhone 13 Pro, the video tells the story of two chicken rice restaurants in Singapore that are clashing in a battle between the old and a modernized way of cooking the country’s beloved hawker dish.

more…

The post Apple’s latest Shot on iPhone 13 Pro short film spotlights food culture in Singapore [Video] appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple is promoting a mini-documentary called 'Poached.' Shot on iPhone 13 Pro, the video tells the story of two chicken rice restaurants.
